caption.p: Anisotropy analysis. Color-coded representation of the direction of maximum anisotropy and their corresponding color distribution histograms for: ( a, b) A ROI containing a nucleolus in a C-mCherry infected cell, ( c, d) randomized image of colors in ( a), ( e, f) Synthetic image of random colors in the same range and ( g, h) mCherry transfected cell. As mCherry do not specifically interact with nucleoli, these structures are not visualized as clear as in ( a). ( i) Distributions of the sum of the quadratic color differences between neighbor pixels and ( j) same histogram in logarithmic scale.
